metadata.title: CVE-2023-1670 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A flaw use after free in the Linux kernel Xircom 16-bit PCMCIA (PC-card)Ethernet driver was found.A local user could use this flaw to crash thesystem or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
